text: avar parannu: su'aibe, ni parayunnatil ninn adhikabhagavum nannalkk manas'silakunnilla. tirccayayum nannalil balahinanayittan ninne nannal kanunnatâ€Œ. ninre kutumbannal illayirunnenkil ninne nannal erinn kealluka tanne ceyyumayirunnu. nannale sambandhiccetattealam niyearu pratapavaneannumalla
